alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 4:20PM CDT until August 24 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BOTTINEAU AND NORTHWESTERN ROLETTE COUNTIES... At 420 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bottineau, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bottineau around 425 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pelican Point State Recreation Area, Carbury, Lake Metigoshe State Park, Homen State Forest and Butte St. Paul State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
